name: High School Blues (StrxberryBliss)
description:
Himari life couldn't get any more worse when her parents encounter a divorce. She is forced to stay with her dreadful mother, who only cares about herself and watches rom-coms in her spare time. Life couldn't get any more harder, when she has to move to another town. 

What awaits her is worse than anything she could have ever imagined. But who knows? The cloud could have a silver liner. Full of love and lessons to be taught.

New and improved visual novel with the feature of playing with a browser. 

Credits to:

Huge Credit to Onboroo for the visual novel sprites!

Denji Santos for Japanese School Bell (Westminster Chime)

LunaLucid for Innocence BGM Pack.

Pinterest for Anime Festival Background.

itch.io for sprites, backgrounds and resources.

Tenor for Anime background GIF.

Thank you so much for playing!

I hope all of your dreams come true in life!

-Aika Sato and Sakura Satori.
